label: Are all original founders still actively involved in the company?
options: [{"id":"major_departures","value":"Major founder departures with no clear replacements"},{"id":"leadership_gaps","value":"One or more founders left, creating leadership gaps"},{"id":"replacements_in_place","value":"Some founders left, but replacements are in place"},{"id":"all_founders_leading","value":"Yes, all founders are still leading the company"}]

label: Have the founders' roles evolved from the ideation stage?
options: [{"id":"no_changes","value":"No changes; founders still handle everything"},{"id":"started_delegating","value":"Founders started delegating some responsibilities"},{"id":"high_level_strategy","value":"Founders are now focusing on high-level strategy, with teams handling execution"}]

label: Is there a designated CEO leading the company?
options: [{"id":"no_ceo_confusion","value":"No CEO or leadership confusion"},{"id":"unofficial_ceo","value":"No official CEO, but one founder assumes the role"},{"id":"official_ceo","value":"Yes, officially assigned and leading"}]

label: Are the founders' responsibilities documented and aligned with company needs?
options: [{"id":"no_clear_distribution","value":"No clear role distribution"},{"id":"somewhat_defined","value":"Responsibilities are somewhat defined, but informal"},{"id":"clear_documentation","value":"Yes, clear documentation exists"}]

label: Do the founders actively engage with investors and advisors?
options: [{"id":"no_regular_communication","value":"No regular communication with investors/advisors"},{"id":"occasional_engagement","value":"Occasional engagement, but not structured"},{"id":"regular_engagement","value":"Yes, regular engagement with investors/advisors"}]

label: Have the founders taken steps to attract experienced leadership outside their founding team?
options: [{"id":"no_efforts","value":"No efforts to expand leadership"},{"id":"in_progress","value":"In progress, but no key hires yet"},{"id":"hired_executives","value":"Yes, they've hired key executives (CFO, CTO, etc.)"}]

label: Do all founders have a formal compensation structure?
options: [{"id":"no_structured_compensation","value":"No structured compensation, all work informally"},{"id":"some_founders_paid","value":"Some founders are paid, others work without formal compensation"},{"id":"formal_compensation","value":"Yes, with salaries or equity-based agreements"}]

label: Has the company formally established departmental structures with defined leadership for each function?
options: [{"id":"no_formal_departments","value":"No formal departments, founders still manage most functions"},{"id":"departments_unclear_leadership","value":"Departments exist, but leadership roles are not clearly defined"},{"id":"clear_department_leaders","value":"Yes, each department has a clear leader with assigned responsibilities"}]

label: Are department heads or key function leaders involved in strategic decision-making alongside the founders?
options: [{"id":"no_involvement","value":"No involvement, founders retain full control over decisions"},{"id":"some_involvement","value":"Some involvement, but founders still make most decisions"},{"id":"participatory_decisions","value":"Yes, department heads participate in leadership decisions"}]

label: Is there a documented organizational chart that reflects the company's current structure?
options: [{"id":"no_org_chart","value":"No organizational chart or documented structure"},{"id":"informal_structure","value":"An informal structure exists but not fully documented"},{"id":"formal_org_chart","value":"Yes, a formal and updated org chart exists"}]

label: Which of the following departments currently exist in your company? (Select all that apply)
options: [{"id":"product_technology","value":"Product & Technology"},{"id":"marketing_sales","value":"Marketing & Sales"},{"id":"finance_accounting","value":"Finance & Accounting"},{"id":"operations_hr","value":"Operations & HR"},{"id":"customer_support","value":"Customer Support / Success"},{"id":"other","value":"Other (please specify)"}]

label: Do all key departments (finance, marketing, tech, operations) have at least one dedicated team member?
options: [{"id":"no","value":"No"},{"id":"partially","value":"Partially"},{"id":"yes","value":"Yes"}]

label: Have department leaders been officially assigned (beyond just the founders)?
options: [{"id":"no","value":"No"},{"id":"partially","value":"Partially"},{"id":"yes","value":"Yes"}]

label: Do departments have clear KPIs and performance tracking in place?
options: [{"id":"no","value":"No"},{"id":"partially","value":"Partially"},{"id":"yes","value":"Yes"}]

label: Is cross-department communication structured and efficient (e.g., meetings, reporting, tools)?
options: [{"id":"no","value":"No"},{"id":"partially","value":"Partially"},{"id":"yes","value":"Yes"}]

label: Upload your organization chart
validation: z.string().optional().refine((val) => !val || val.endsWith(".pdf"), "File must be a PDF format")

label: Who is responsible for product & technology development?
options: [{"id":"founder_led","value":"Founder-led"},{"id":"assigned_tech_lead","value":"Assigned tech lead, but not officially CTO"},{"id":"cto_experienced","value":"CTO or experienced head of product"}]

label: What is their highest level of education in a technical field?
options: [{"id":"no_formal_tech_education","value":"No formal tech education"},{"id":"bachelors_cs_engineering","value":"Bachelor's in CS/Engineering"},{"id":"masters_phd_specialized","value":"Master's/PhD or specialized technical training"}]

label: How many years of experience do they have in software/product development?
options: [{"id":"less_than_1_year","value":"<1 year"},{"id":"1_to_3_years","value":"1-3 years"},{"id":"4_to_6_years","value":"4-6 years"},{"id":"7_plus_years","value":"7+ years"}]

label: Have they led a tech/product team before?
options: [{"id":"no_leadership_experience","value":"No leadership experience"},{"id":"some_experience_no_leadership","value":"Some experience but not in a leadership role"},{"id":"previous_leadership_experience","value":"Previous leadership experience in a similar role"}]

label: Who is responsible for marketing & sales strategy?
options: [{"id":"founder_led","value":"Founder-led"},{"id":"dedicated_manager_no_cmo","value":"Dedicated marketing/sales manager, but no CMO"},{"id":"cmo_experienced","value":"CMO or highly experienced marketing/sales lead"}]

label: What is their highest level of education in business/marketing?
options: [{"id":"no_formal_education","value":"No formal education in marketing/business"},{"id":"bachelors_marketing_business","value":"Bachelor's in Marketing/Business"},{"id":"masters_mba","value":"Master's/MBA in Marketing/Business Strategy"}]

label: How many years of experience do they have in sales, branding, or customer acquisition?
options: [{"id":"less_than_1_year","value":"<1 year"},{"id":"1_to_3_years","value":"1-3 years"},{"id":"4_to_6_years","value":"4-6 years"},{"id":"7_plus_years","value":"7+ years"}]

label: Have they worked in a similar industry before?
options: [{"id":"no_industry_experience","value":"No industry experience"},{"id":"some_industry_exposure","value":"Some industry exposure, but not direct experience"},{"id":"previous_industry_experience","value":"Previous marketing/sales experience in the same industry"}]

label: Who manages company finances and investor relations?
options: [{"id":"founder_led_no_expert","value":"Founder-led with no finance expert"},{"id":"hired_manager_no_cfo","value":"Hired finance manager but no CFO"},{"id":"cfo_financial_expert","value":"CFO or financial expert with relevant experience"}]

label: What is their educational background in finance/accounting?
options: [{"id":"no_finance_background","value":"No finance/accounting background"},{"id":"bachelors_finance","value":"Bachelor's in Finance/Accounting/Economics"},{"id":"masters_certification","value":"Master's (MBA, CFA, CPA, or similar certification)"}]

label: Do they have prior experience in financial planning, budgeting, or fundraising?
options: [{"id":"less_than_1_year","value":"<1 year"},{"id":"1_to_3_years","value":"1-3 years"},{"id":"4_to_6_years","value":"4-6 years"},{"id":"7_plus_years","value":"7+ years"}]

label: How many years of experience do they have in finance/accounting/investment?
options: [{"id":"less_than_1_year","value":"<1 year"},{"id":"1_to_3_years","value":"1-3 years"},{"id":"4_to_6_years","value":"4-6 years"},{"id":"7_plus_years","value":"7+ years"}]

label: Who is responsible for company operations and HR?
options: [{"id":"founder_led_no_ops_lead","value":"Founder-led with no dedicated operations lead"},{"id":"hired_manager_no_coo","value":"Hired operations/HR manager but no COO"},{"id":"coo_experienced","value":"COO or highly experienced operations/HR lead"}]

label: What is their background in business operations, supply chain, or management?
options: [{"id":"no_formal_background","value":"No formal background"},{"id":"bachelors_business","value":"Bachelor's in Business, Management, or related field"},{"id":"masters_mba","value":"Master's or MBA in Business Operations"}]

label: Do they have prior experience in business operations, supply chain, or management?
options: [{"id":"less_than_1_year","value":"<1 year"},{"id":"1_to_3_years","value":"1-3 years"},{"id":"4_to_6_years","value":"4-6 years"},{"id":"7_plus_years","value":"7+ years"}]

label: Does each department have at least one dedicated full-time employee (excluding the founder-led roles)?
options: [{"id":"founders_handle_most","value":"No, founders still handle most department responsibilities"},{"id":"some_departments_have","value":"Some departments have full-time employees, others don't"},{"id":"every_department_has","value":"Yes, every department has at least one full-time team member"}]

label: How many employees (excluding founders) are currently in the company?
options: [{"id":"1_to_3_employees","value":"1-3 employees"},{"id":"4_to_7_employees","value":"4-7 employees"},{"id":"8_plus_employees","value":"8+ employees"}]

label: Are employee roles and responsibilities formally documented for each department?
options: [{"id":"no_formal_documentation","value":"No formal documentation, responsibilities are loosely defined"},{"id":"some_roles_documented","value":"Some roles are documented, but not fully structured"},{"id":"clearly_documented","value":"Yes, roles and responsibilities are clearly documented"}]

label: Is each department equipped with the necessary tools, software, or infrastructure to operate efficiently?
options: [{"id":"basic_manual_processes","value":"No, departments rely on basic/manual processes"},{"id":"some_departments_have_tools","value":"Some departments have tools, but others are still lacking"},{"id":"all_departments_equipped","value":"Yes, each department has all necessary tools for efficiency"}]

label: Have departments developed internal processes and workflows to handle daily operations?
options: [{"id":"no_clear_workflows","value":"No clear workflows, operations are handled reactively"},{"id":"some_processes_exist","value":"Some processes exist, but not fully structured"},{"id":"documented_workflows","value":"Yes, documented workflows exist for each department"}]
